name: area-code
description: The issue or PR is about library code.

name: v1.x
description: The issue or PR affects version 1 of the library.

name: platform-all
description: The issue or PR affects all supported platforms.

name: platform-net
description: The issue or PR affects the .NET platform.

name: platform-net
description: The issue or PR affects the .NET Core platform.

name: platform-netcore
description: The issue or PR affects the .NET Framework platform.

name: platform-xamarin
description: The issue or PR affects the Xamarin platform.

name: os-all
description: The issue or PR affects all supported operating systems.

name: os-windows
description: The issue or PR only affects Windows deployments.

name: os-linux
description: The issue or PR only affects Linux deployments.

name: os-macosx
description: The issue or PR only affects MacOS deployments.

name: os-ios
description: The issue or PR only affects iOS deployments.

name: os-android
description: The issue or PR only affects Android deployments.

name: os-webassembly
description: The issue or PR only affects Android deployments.

name: area-tests
description: The issue or PR is about tests and does not affect code.

name: area-dependencies
description: The issue requires to / the PR does add, update, or remove dependencies.

name: area-documentation
description: The issue or PR is about documentation and does not affect code.

name: area-automation
description: The issue or PR is about CI / CD / actions.

name: bug
description: The issue raises / the PR solves a bug.

name: enhancement
description: The issue requests / the PR implements new or improved functionality.

name: refactor
description: The issue requests / the PR implements a refactor of existing code without affecting functionality.

name: design
description: The issue is a design discussion. Not for PRs.

name: breaking_change
description: The issue requires / the PR contains breaking changes.

name: help_wanted
description: Help is needed to solve the issue / finalize the PR.

name: easy
description: Easy issue, good pick for new collaborators. Not for PRs.

name: invalid
description: [Issue] The reported bug is in another project, the enhancement makes little or no sense, or this is otherwise not a valid issue.

name: duplicate
description: [Issue] This is a duplicate of another issue.

name: by_design
description: [Issue] The lamented behavior is by design.

name: wontfix
description: [Issue] The issue is valid, but will not be acted upon, for reasons hopefully explained in comments.
